resources.string: The easiest way to order food from your favourite restaurant!
Book movie tickets for your family and friends!
Best discounts on every single service we offer!
Book tickets of any transportation and travel the world!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
With Oran Tramway app, you can navigate between the different stations along the tram rail and know the estimated distance and time. all without internet connection.
You can move between stations and display more information just by a simple click
Now, Oran\'s Tram app lets you get the distance and the time between any two stations
You are a step away from the map, just turn-on your internet connection and let the app download it for you
